name: Australia
rmk: all IFR. VFR at or above FL290 foreign registered airframes exempted until 06.06.2020 per Instrument number CASA 113/16 AUS registered private VFR below FL290 required from 01.01.2020

name: Canada
url: currently not mandated but required to receive surveillance based separation services in Hudson Bay area

name: China

name: Fiji
